title.rendered: H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama and the Minister of the International Department of the Communist Party of China (IDCPC), H.E. Liu Jianchao in a virtual meeting

content.rendered:
The Hon. Minister of Foreign Affairs, H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama and the Minister of the International Department of the Communist Party of China (IDCPC), H.E. Liu Jianchao in a virtual meeting, unveiled the magazine, “Contemporary World Nigeria…” today, 18th November, 2022.
The event was jointly organized by the Institute for Peace and Conflict Resolution (IPCR) & the Chinese Embassy in Abuja. Other participants, included the DG (IPCR) – Dr. Bakut T. Bakut, the Vice Minister of IDCPC- H.E. Shen Beili, Nigerian Amb. to China – H.E. Baba A. Jidda, Chinese Ambassador to Nigeria H.E. Mr. Cui Jian Chun, and the DOOPS MFA – Amb. Janet Olisa, among other dignitaries.
